body:
Comment 1: 
golang.org shows the latest Go release, which really was that long ago
since we've been concentrating on Go 1.  It only describes the
weekly snapshots that went into that release.  Listing newer ones
would probably be even more confusing.

So I think the solution is just to use weekly.golang.org
when that's what you want.
_Status changed to **Unfortunate**._
